column1: 1. Base Alcohol: Negotiate bulk pricing (target 20% reduction)
2. Aluminum Cans: Alternative sourcing/brite cans (target 15% reduction)
4. Flavoring: Reformulation or volume discount (target 15% reduction)
- SKU #2 (Lemon Elderflower): HIGHEST PRIORITY - 8.8% margin unsustainable
- SKU #4 (Bourbon Cherry): Consider price increase to $5.00 retail
- SKU #1 (Cucumber Lime): Best performer - focus growth here
- Overall: Must achieve 35% margin within 60 days to survive
